episodes.title: The Ant Hill Kids: Canada's Most Disturbing Cult of All Time
episodes.description:
The Ant Hill Kids: Canada's Most Disturbing Cult of All Time

The Ant Hill Kids was Canada's most disturbing cult, led by Roch Theriault, who committed unspeakable acts of horror against his followers. This is the complete true crime documentary exposing the horrifying reality of what happened in rural Quebec.

In this dark history documentary, we uncover the disturbing cult story of the Ant Hill Kids and their leader Roch Theriault. From 1977 to 1989, this Canadian cult operated in isolation, where cult survivors like Gabrielle Lavallee endured unimaginable abuse.

This true crime documentary explores:
• The origins of the Ant Hill Kids cult
• Roch Theriault's manipulation and control tactics  
• The horrifying acts committed against cult members
• How Canadian authorities finally stopped this religious cult
• Survivor testimonies and the aftermath

This is one of the most disturbing cult cases in Canadian true crime history, rivaling international cult horror stories in its brutality. If you're interested in dark history, cult documentaries, and true crime stories from Canada, this investigation reveals the complete timeline of events.

🔔 Subscribe to Gothic Ledger for more disturbing documentary content covering dark history, true crime cases, and forgotten stories from asylum walls, church vaults, and hidden institutions.

#AntHillKids #TrueCrimeDocumentary #DarkHistory #CultDocumentary #CanadianCult #DisturbingCult

episodes.title: Alaska's Most Disturbing Cult Family - Papa Pilgrim True Crime Documentary
episodes.description:
Alaska's Most Disturbing Cult Family - Papa Pilgrim True Crime Documentary

The shocking true crime documentary of Alaska's most disturbing cult family. Papa Pilgrim fooled an entire community while hiding decades of abuse in the frozen wilderness of McCarthy, Alaska.

In 2005, two sisters escaped 60 miles across sub-zero terrain to expose the horrifying truth about their father, Robert "Papa Pilgrim" Hale, and the religious cult family that captivated America.

🔍 CASE FILE: The Papa Pilgrim Cult
📍 LOCATION: McCarthy, Alaska
📅 TIMELINE: 1998-2008
⚖️ OUTCOME: Conviction & Mysterious Death

This true crime documentary reveals:
• How a convicted murderer reinvented himself as a pioneer patriarch
• The systematic abuse hidden behind a wholesome family image
• The 60-mile midnight escape that brought justice
• The cult family dynamics that fooled investigators for years
• Unanswered questions that haunt Alaska to this day

#TrueCrime #CultDocumentary #AlaskaCrime #PapaPilgrim #CultFamily
